p: This species also has already shown favorable results in tests in humans—either healthy or bearing some nontransmissible chronic disease—for 6 months. Treatment with 500 mg of HCA, twice a day, promoted weight loss and reduction of fatty mass, visceral fat, total cholesterol, and glycemic profile. Furthermore, an increase of the basal metabolic rate was perceived, independent of sex, age, or bearing hypertension, diabetes mellitus type 2, or dyslipidemia [ 107].
